SEARCH
Package h

Class Internship

java.lang.Object
h.Internship
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Internship extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an internship opportunity posted by a company. Manages its details, status, and associated applications.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    Constructs an Internship object, assigning a unique ID and setting the default status to "Pending".

  • Constructor Details

    • Internship

      public Internship(String title, String description, InternshipLevel level, Majors preferredMajor, Date openingDate, Date closingDate, String companyName, String representativeUsername, int slots)
      Constructs an Internship object, assigning a unique ID and setting the default status to "Pending".
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the internship.
      description - A brief description of the role.
      level - The required experience level (e.g., BASIC, ADVANCED).
      preferredMajor - The major preferred for this role.
      openingDate - The date the internship becomes open for applications.
      closingDate - The final date for applications.
      companyName - The name of the posting company.
      representativeUsername - The username of the company representative who created it.
      slots - The total number of available positions.

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Gets the unique ID of the internship.
      Returns:
      The internship ID.

    • getTitle

      public String getTitle()

    • getLevel

      public InternshipLevel getLevel()

    • getPreferredMajor

      public Majors getPreferredMajor()

    • getStatus

      public String getStatus()
      Gets the current status of the internship (e.g., "Pending", "Approved", "Filled").
      Returns:
      The status string.

    • getTotalSlots

      public int getTotalSlots()
      Gets the total number of available slots for this internship.
      Returns:
      The total slots.

    • getFilledSlots

      public int getFilledSlots()
      Gets the number of slots that have been filled.
      Returns:
      The filled slots count.

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible()
      Checks if the internship is currently visible to students for application.
      Returns:
      true if visible, false otherwise.

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(String status)
      Sets a new status for the internship, ensuring the status is valid.
      Parameters:
      status - The new status string to set.

    • toggleVisibility

      public void toggleVisibility()
      Toggles the visibility of the internship, but only if its status is "Approved". Prints an error if the status is not "Approved".

    • addApplication

      public void addApplication(StudentApplication application)
      Adds a new student application to the internship's list of applications. Prevents adding null applications or duplicates.
      Parameters:
      application - The StudentApplication object to add.

    • processApplication

      public void processApplication(int studentId, boolean isApproved)
      Processes a specific student's application by updating its status (Successful or Rejected).
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student whose application is being processed.
      isApproved - true to set status to "Successful", false to set status to "Rejected".

    • incrementFilledSlots

      public void incrementFilledSlots()
      Increments the count of filled slots. If the filled slots reach the total slots, the internship status is set to "Filled" and visibility is turned off.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the internship's key details.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A formatted string with ID, Title, Status, Major, Level, and Slots.
